mil6.2.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ayam suriyo sabbakalam kathinam tapati, udahu kincikalam mandam tapati”ti?
mil6.2.9:1.2: “Sabbakalam, maharaja, suriyo kathinam tapati, na kincikalam mandam tapati”ti.
mil6.2.9:1.3: “Yadi, bhante nagasena, suriyo sabbakalam kathinam tapati, kissa pana appekada suriyo kathinam tapati, appekada mandam tapati”ti?
mil6.2.9:1.4: “Cattarome, maharaja, suriyassa roga, yesam annatarena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati.
mil6.2.9:1.6: Abbham, maharaja, suriyassa rogo, tena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati.
mil6.2.9:1.7: Mahika, maharaja, suriyassa rogo, tena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati.
mil6.2.9:1.8: Megho, maharaja, suriyassa rogo, tena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati.
mil6.2.9:1.9: Rahu, maharaja, suriyassa rogo, tena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati.
mil6.2.9:1.10: Ime kho, maharaja, cattaro suriyassa roga, yesam annatarena rogena patipilito suriyo mandam tapati”ti.
mil6.2.9:1.11: “Acchariyam, bhante nagasena, abbhutam, bhante nagasena, suriyassapi tava tejosampannassa rogo uppajjissati, kimangam pana annesam sattanam, natthi, bhante, esa vibhatti annassa annatra tavadisena buddhimata”ti.
